def insertion_sort(arr):
    s = 0
    while s < len(arr):
        z = i
        while z > 0 and arr[z - 1] > arr[z]:
            temp = arr[z]
            arr[z] = arr[z - 1]
            arr[z - 1] = temp
            z -= 1
        s += 1
    return arr

def insertion_sort(arr):
    s = 0
    while s <= len(arr) - 1:
        z = i
        while z > 0 and arr[z - 1] > arr[z]:
            temp = arr[z]
            arr[z] = arr[z - 1]
            arr[z - 1] = temp
            z -= 1
        s += 1
    return arr
